changeSet.id: Specimen disposal event - Move existing reasons to the description
changeSet.sql: update catissue_disposal_event_param set comments = concat(ifnull(reason, ''), '\n', ifnull(comments, ''))

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Specimen disposal event - Move the reason to the description
changeSet.sql: update catissue_disposal_event_param set comments = concat(reason, concat('\n', comments))

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Specimen disposal event - Set Not Specified as reason for all existing disposal events
changeSet.sql: update catissue_disposal_event_param set reason_id = ( select identifier from catissue_permissible_value where public_id = 'specimen_dispose_reason' and value = 'Not Specified' )
